advancedsearch-desc: Fʋn na niŋ si'em paam ieb linɛ an viki na'ana [[Special:Search]]
advancedsearch-options-pane-preview-list: Nannanna zi'el banɛ ka ba dɔlisi ied
advancedsearch-field-subpageof: Lak-si'eba banɛ bɛ lak kaŋa ni
advancedsearch-field-inlanguage: Lakir banɛ bɛ pian'ad nwa ni
advancedsearch-field-filew: Faal labisim zem si'em pigizil ni
advancedsearch-field-fileh: Faali dʋʋ agɔla si'em pigizil bama ni
advancedsearch-help-plain: ;Pa'alʋg :Fʋn na ied pian'abama pian'azutin la bɛɛ sɔb la ni. ;Baŋim bʋmbama nwa :* Fʋ na tun'e kpɛn'ɛs Pian'ababʋg kpɛla. :* Pian'agʋda nɛ sɔb banɛ ka' sɔb bielim bɛɛ kallɛ (ya'a ka kɔlɔm nɛ kɔnma) kʋ paasɛ. :* Fʋn ied si'ela bʋn ayinne bɛɛ ayi' tun'e kae li nii. :* Ban tun'e paas bʋnsieba pian'ʋk-giŋin. Nwɛnnɛ: Fʋ ya'a kpɛn'ɛs ''tuurin kaa'', ieb la mɛ tun'e paas ''tuurin kaanam''. Pian'ad wʋsa mɔr bam paasid si'elnam pian'ʋk-giŋin si'em. ;Lakir dinɛ sʋŋid :[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#Full_text_search Full text search] ;Syntax-equivalent in the normal search :sesame street car
advancedsearch-help-phrase: ;Pa'alʋg :Fʋ ya'a ied sɔb-biela banɛ bɛɛ ba kɔn'. Pian'agʋnda pʋ paasida. ;Baŋim bʋmbama nwa :(fʋ ya'a niŋid kotesin maks din ka li nar, gɔsim nwɛnnɛm banɛ bɛ nwa) :* Wɛligim ieb pian'agima la nɛ vʋ'ʋsim zanbin bɛɛ paalbil nwɛnnɛ "Gbis wala", "m zua!". :* Pian'agʋda nɛ sɔb banɛ ka' sɔb bielim bɛɛ kallɛ (ya'a ka kɔlɔm nɛ kɔnma) pʋ paasɛ. :* Search is not case-sensitive. :* Word stemming is not applied. ;Help page :[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#Words.2C_phrases.2C_and_modifiers Words, phrases, and modifiers] ;Syntax-equivalent in the normal search :Words in quotation marks, for example "Begin at the beginning".
